description: Drishya is our annual photography festival held in collaboration with Thomso. It celebrates visual storytelling, showcases student photography, and invites creative exploration through multiple genres. With a footfall of over 2000+, Drishya is a celebration of lenses, light, and vision.

events.title: Photography Competitions
events.description: Multiple categories including Wildlife, Street, Portrait, and Landscape photography contests.

events.title: Expert Workshops
events.description: Learn from renowned photographers through hands-on workshops and masterclasses.

events.title: Photo Exhibitions
events.description: Showcase of stunning photographs from students and professional photographers.

events.title: Guest Lectures
events.description: Inspiring talks by industry professionals sharing their experiences and insights.
